author: Q U A S A R
title: Pharo - ACM
description: DeFi/Cryppto/Cardano is not mainstream and it is difficult to onboard new people into the crypto markets.

author: Rajiv Tangri
title: Fund the masses
description: How do we get DeFi to take off on ADA as the current barrier to entry on Ethereum is very high

author: Phil McKnight
title: Promptous Trust + Loyalty Program
description: Traditional insurance is built with inherent distrust, which is expensive to circumvent. This leads fraud, claim denial, and waste

author: Imran Ahmed
title: Kitty Party 😺  DeFi Lending Circle
description: Banks exploit their bargaining power over the community. DeFi currently requires %100+ collateral. We need a realistic borrowing option.

author: Q U A S A R
title: Credentialing Liquidity Dex
description: Medical Credentialing Costs payers about $2B/year and the process is 80 to 120 days.

author: Long Nguyen
title: MinSwap - Multi-pool DEX
description: Currently, there isn't any DEX on Cardano and new projects don't have a place to bootstrap their token distribution.

author: Michael McNulty
title: Grow Our Own Teams
description: Untapped expertise already exists in Catalyst. Recruited teams might not share Cardano's vision and values.

author: rcmorano [PEACE]
title: Dandelion: Cardano API market
description: There are too few professional deployments of Cardano API gateways. This limits the ability of light dApps and services to operate at scale.

author: Boone Bergsma
title: Carbonland Trust Carbon Credits DEX
description: Trees are being cut down at a rapid pace, forests are disappearing, co2 is increasing, the ecosystems that clean our air are in major danger

author: Boone Bergsma
title: Stiff Money | Crowdlending PaaS
description: Getting a stable Annual Percentage Yield (APY) on the assets your holding is hard. And getting a loan to buy a home is even harder.

author: fsamvura
title: Small business expansion funding
description: Small businesses are often funded by friends/relatives with shares informally distributed or only certified by legal founding documents.

author: Ilya Oskin
title: ErgoDex Plutus Port
description: We need a non-custodial decentralized exchange allowing us to transfer a liquidity over the Cardano network easy, fast and secure.

author: Liqwid Labs
title: Liqwid x Credmark R&D on Loan Risks
description: Lending protocols require well-tested models to mitigate loan default risk & liquidity crunch events. This risk should be modeled/simulated.

author: Liqwid Labs
title: Liqwid Protocol Security Audit
description: DeFi protocols built in Plutus are new, untested design patterns for constructing UTXO smart contracts that will soon hold billions in TVL.

title: Daedalus Wallet Node SBC Devices
description:
2 "Ready to mass produce" Devices

A- Aluminum unit

B- Touchscreen unit

Currently dev app of Daedalus

To Fedora 5.11.12-300.fc34aarch64

author: François-René Rideau
title: AVOUM: Account View on UTXO Model
description: DeFi smart contracts that anyone can interact with are subject to "DoS" attacks by constantly racing other participants to the current UTXO.

author: Mark Broadbent
title: DEFI billing - an untapped market?
description: Consider the vast number of utilities & other Gov orgs that bill customers on a regular basis using expensive inflexible insecure solutions.

author: Eric Helms
title: Smart Contract Audit Token SCAT DAO
description: Consumers have trouble trusting DeFi Dapps with their money. Dapps can be audited, but how can you trust a paid auditor to act impartially?

author: Ronald Le
title: A DEX aggregator on Cardano
description: There is a shortage of DEXs, Dapps building on Cardano's Ecosystems

author: RAY Network
title: RAY Swap
description: Cardano ecosystem needs more competitive AMM exchange tools.

author: Robert O'Brien
title: AMM for Continuous Financing
description: Financing innovation, science, and culture need complex economic protocols but developing these financial primitives is difficult.
